"\"Phantom Marker\" is a Class Skill that activates automatically if it has been learned.

If you attack an enemy several times, you will place a marker on it. If you then continue to attack the marked enemy, you will increase the level of the marker.

※The visual indicator of the marker disappears over time, but the effect remains. If you attack the enemy again, the marker visual will reappear."
